賣官鬻爵.en: to sell official posts and titles, describes a corrupt government

錶肉.en: watch movement, the internal mechanisms of a watch

風水佬呃你十年八年，唔呃得一世.en: literally: 'a Fung Shui master can fool you for only eight to ten years, but not for a whole life'; time will tell; you will realise with time that I am telling you the truth; time will witness the truth; would I lie to you?

食無情雞.en: to be fired; to receive a pink slip (a letter of dismissal)

食錯藥.en: taking the wrong medication, acting unreasonable (spoken)

唔好撚扮嘢.en: don't fucking pretend; who the fuck are you trying to kid? [colloquial]

無事獻殷勸非奸即盜.en: one who is unaccountably solicitous is hiding evil intentions [colloquial]
